status: Processing Complete – Claim Accepted (Covered Peril: Theft/Vandalism)

logs.message: FNOL received via Broker Portal. Metadata extracted: submitter=Susan Lee (Broker), timestamp=2025-10-05T14:45:20Z, policy=CP-301-7890.
Structured fields parsed for theft/vandalism incident at rental apartment complex. Insured entity: Green Fields Apartments LLC.
Detected police report reference, tenant witness statement, and security footage metadata. No invoices submitted yet.
Address normalized and geocoded: 9800 Greenwood Ave, Seattle, WA 98103.
No existing matching vandalism/theft claim found for this property/date. Proceeding.
Policy CP-301-7890 retrieved. Active. Theft and vandalism included in covered perils. Deductible=$2,500.
Matched peril: Theft/Vandalism. No exclusions triggered. Location matches covered premises.
Premiums fully paid. No lapse or reinstatement issues.
Coverage integrity score computed: 94%. Strong match for covered peril and insured property.
Estimated loss severity: Moderate ($25K–$250K). Stolen appliances + forced entry repairs.
No fraud indicators detected. Police report validated. Security footage metadata consistent with event timeline.
Recommend virtual inspection + contractor estimate upload. Field adjuster optional.
Requested repair estimates, full tenant witness statement, and security video export.
Revalidated theft details with witness and police report. No discrepancies found.
Preliminary estimate: $82,000 (appliance theft, door/frame replacements, damaged common areas).
Initial reserve set at $90,000 including potential supplemental repair costs.
Reserve level within adjuster authority limits. No escalation required.
Final determination: Fully covered claim. Theft/vandalism validated under policy terms.
Preparing settlement options: Replacement Cost Value and Repair Vendor Direct Pay.
Claim FNOL-CP-301-7890-GFA ACCEPTED. Insured and broker notified with next steps and payment options.
